scripts.rebuild-java: cd node_modules/java && node-gyp rebuild --target=10.1.1 --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && node postInstall.js
scripts.rebuild-java-debug: cd node_modules/java && node-gyp rebuild --debug --target=10.1.1 --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && node postInstall.js
